description: This file sets up a CSV knowledge base with vector database integration, initializes an agent with this knowledge, and performs a sample query.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class representing a CSV-based knowledge base with vector database support.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Class representing a PostgreSQL vector database integration.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown.
